 Interface for objects that approximate a given state as a weighted average of other states. More...

 Interface for objects that wish to be notified when an Average changes how it approximates its query state. More...

 Interface for objects that construct Average objects. More...

 Interface for Averagers that permit the dynamic (user-directed) growth of the set of states used to approximate query states. More...
